Danilo Zim

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6218939542498152
  • Última atualização do currículo em 26/09/2008

As Process Chemist my responsibilities include the invention at laboratorial scale, scale-up at pilot plant and industrial implementation of routes of synthesis for new target molecules. I have been also contributed to improve the existing industrial processes by fixed costs and variable costs reduction as well by supporting industrial plants in order to guaranty production with safety and quality. (Texto informado pelo autor)

1999 - 2002
Doutorado em Química.
Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul, UFRGS, Brasil.
Título: Reação de Acoplamento Suzuki: Desenvolvimento de Novos Catalisadores e Estudos Mecanísticos, Ano de obtenção: 2002.
Orientador: Adriano Lisboa Monteiro.

Outras informações
As Process Chemist my responsibilities include the invention at laboratorial scale, scale-up at pilot plant and industrial implementation of routes of synthesis for new target molecules. I have been also contributed to improve the existing industrial processes by fixed costs and variable costs reduction as well by supporting industrial plants in order to guaranty production with safety and quality.


Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul, UFRGS, Brasil.
